text:
@nytimes Your condescending language needs to be corrected. India woke up to the severity of the pandemic very early. 
All existing visas, except diplomatic, officials, employment, project visas, were suspended till April 15. The PM Narendra Modi appealed to people to co-operate. https://t.co/xzSi1SUn9R
